sentences.en: Dependable production is just as important as the magnitude of output.
sentences.cn: 可靠的生产和巨大生产量一样重要.

sentences.en: He was dependable, straightforward, the boy next door.
sentences.cn: 他可靠、坦率，是邻家男孩那种类型。

sentences.en: His method is basically practicalism, and his conclusion is dependable.
sentences.cn: 他对城邦政制的研究基本上是实证主义的, 许多结论也是靠得住的.

sentences.en: Information in the world is slower and more cumbersome, but very dependable.
sentences.cn: 世界中的信息使用起来更慢,也更麻烦, 但非常可靠.

sentences.en: Our work - force are completely dependable.
sentences.cn: 我们的工作人员的能力完全可靠.

sentences.en: She is loyal and totally dependable.
sentences.cn: 她很忠诚,完全值得信赖.

sentences.en: The die is in dependable operation and the product is satisfactory.
sentences.cn: 该模具已投入生产使用,工作可靠,制件质量符合设计要求.

sentences.en: There was no dependable defense against a modern tank or plane.
sentences.cn: 对于现代化坦克或飞机,亦无有效的防御方法.

sentences.en: They would say that I am a dependable fun person to work with.
sentences.cn: 他们会说我是个可靠而且一起共事很有趣的人.

sentences.en: This couple is very service - oriented and known to be dependable.
sentences.cn: 这样的一对是以服务为导向的和知道怎样相互依赖的.

sentences.en: When resistance in the circuit exceeds 140 ohms, the reading is not completely dependable.
sentences.cn: 网路电阻超过140欧姆时, 读数就完全不准了.

sentences.en: When resistance in the circuit exceeds 230 ohms, the reading is not completely dependable.
sentences.cn: 网路电阻超过230欧姆时，读数就完全不准了。

words.tran_cn: 依靠的；从属的；取决于…的
依赖，依靠；取决于；相信，信赖

trans.tran_en: able to be trusted to do what you need or expect
